website_summaries.verdict: Nikon produces another solid point-and-shoot compact megazoom with the Coolpix S9100 by offering fast performance, good photos, and an excellent feature-to-price ratio.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix S9100 has fast shooting performance, a wide, long lens in a pocketable body, and several useful and fun shooting modes
cons: The Coolpix S9100's photo and video quality is soft, particularly at high ISOs and in low-light conditions
It also lacks auto picture rotation

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: My much-loved Nikon died, and I took a chance ordering a refurbished camera of the same model, but I'm glad I did. It's in excellent condition, better than my old one, and for one-tenth the price of when it was new!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It is a fabulous camera.
customer_reviews.text: I use the wide angle picture capacity and telephoto lens to take wildlife pictures at Carney Marsh and Brenton Arboretum and Neal Smith Prairie. The camera has worked perfectly. I take it on hikes and in my canoe and in my camping gear. It is small and light weight. When I go out into the outdoors, I take no photo equipment but the camera itself in a hard case. I recommend getting the largest capacity flash card to fit inside the camera so you can take the maximum number of pictures and take them back to download on the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Hance

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing camera. I've had it for 4 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera. I've had it for 4 years and it is still working very well. Picture quality is good and camera is rugged. Of course, smartphone cameras are gradually overtaking it However, it was a great buy and have no regrets
customer_reviews.author: @think_r

customer_reviews.title: Nice pictures and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera back in 2011 and it has done it's job. Unfortunately, I dropped it on Christmas day and wrecked the lens. I was looking for a simple point and shoot that took a decent picture and I found that in the S9100. I'm thinking about buying another 9100, but I'm looking at the A900 as well. All in all if you are looking for a basic point and shoot you can't go wrong with the S9100.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for over a year and it still takes great pictures. These days, mobile phones take those everyday picture and for the most part, that's good enough. However, no mobile phone can take a better picture than this Nikon (at least not yet). There are still inherent limitations with mobile phones and for those images that you may wish to send of to have enlarged, or photos that are very important, you want something more- this Nikon delivers. Prices have come way down and you can buy it for cheaper than I did. Despite being over a year old, it serves my purposes great.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveler

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with my Nikon camera & Nikon customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Nikon camera at the end of February 2012 and took it on vacation in mid May 2012. The camera stopped working in the first week of my vacation. I returned the camera to Nikon on June1 2012. It is now July 23, 2012 and the camera remains at Nikon waiting for parts. Numerous phone calls to Nikon have not solved the problem. They are "waiting for parts". I believe by this time they should have sent me a new camera. I will NEVER buy another Nikon product. Fortunately I had brought my old Cannon camera on the vacation and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnielou

customer_reviews.title: It will still take pictures with the standard focus and if I am lucky with the zoom lens on a good day. Of course not too happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for one I dropped. It is a rebuild. I have had it for 8 months. It started acting up at 5 months with a zoom lens error and shut off on me. It will still take pictures with the standard focus and if I am lucky with the zoom lens on a good day. Of course not too happy. My husband has had one for three years that is still working well. He bought his new, as I did my first, that worked well for about one and half years before I dropped it on a cement floor.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Rose

customer_reviews.title: I would not have purchase a used camera for this amount
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I was buying a used item. guess it is working ok BUT the first use the metal ring around the lens fell off. it is battered and bent..but arrived that way. I would have sent back except that I needed the camera immediately. I would not have paid what I did for a used camera. it also arrived with someone else photos on it, undeleted. )-:
customer_reviews.author: Alea Wiggle Girl.

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY: Camera Freezes often
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera based on the good reviews and features... but after a month of use, it started locking up, where the shutter, zoom, etc wouldn't work but the screen would still be on. This happens right after you turn on the camera and zoom in. When the camera freezes, the only thing to do is to take out the battery and reset the camera. We're on vacation today and it happened 8 times today... It's been a total of two months since I purchased the camera from Amazon. Too late to return it to Amazon so I'm stuck contacting Nikon and the whole repair process!
customer_reviews.author: SKL

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pocket camera. Pictures are fabulous and the zoom is just what I wanted in a small camera. Make sure you get an LCD protector because the case or pocket will rub on the screen, and if you lay it down on its back, the screen will get scratched. Update as of 5-6-13. Still using this camera. It has worked flawlessly. Batteries last a long time. I put a 4GB memory card in it and it holds thousands of pictures. Have not had a single problem with this camera and it gets a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great as an almost pocketable extra camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a photo enthusiast and almost exclusively use DSLR's and an SLT. I bought this camera knowing its limitations and so far have not been disappointed. I have not experienced any of the problems that other users mentioned but in fairness I don't use it a lot. It would be nice to have RAW capability and PSAM settings but that's not what this camera was designed for. Sometimes it's nice to sit back and let the camera do the work and it does that very nicely especially in lower light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: good camera, but...
customer_reviews.text: Got it some months ago. I'm no camera expert but overall I can say the camera works well. My first complain is when connecting the camera to the PC through USB. On my Windows 7 pc I was unable to copy some pictures from the camera to the pc. On my 2nd PC (running different Linux distros) the camera doesn't even gets detected.This issue can be solved by removing the sd-card from the camera and inserting it directly on the pc but still is a very annoying issue. My second complain is that there hasn't been any firmware update since the camera came out to market. I would rate this camera a 3.8 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Dibad

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera locks up at times-won't focus at times-can not delete images at times-won't shut off at times-won't zoom at times-won't focus at times. Must take the battery out and back in to get the camera to operate but still some of the features don't operate most of the time. Won't take closeup images most of the time. When it does work it is a great camera. I find I have to spend 10 minutes or more at times to get it to work. I don't know if this is a problem with this model or just this camera because it was used. Is this why it was sold?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really had opportunity to use all this much as of yet. Only used around the house getting familiar with controls & settings. For now I find the "Auto Setting" works best for me being quick & easy. Small enough to carry just about everywhere I go, although not a shirt pocket model still handy to take along. Make no mistake; this camera is not a DSLR, but then not as large & bulky neither. So it's about perfect for my purpose. The zoom is fantastic, but you need a steady hand for maximum zoom. All in all, a great grab & go camera that gives good results if used for what it's designed for.
customer_reviews.author: rca

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have owned Minolta, Sony, Canon and Panasonic. This is my first Nikon and I am extremely impressed. The Nikon replaces a Panasonic Lumix purchased six years ago which still gives good service. The Nikon is so much better......almost 4 times the zoom.....easy to use......small and easy to carry......easy to use.....great photographs even in difficult conditions....video capability is superb. My only complaint is the record button location which is adjacent to the thumb/index finger grasp area. I typically activate the video record button accidently several times when I'm just taking photographs. Honestly, this camera is a value gold mine, so why should I complain about such a minor detail?
customer_reviews.author: thevelvetking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome telephoto, great features
customer_reviews.text: Only used the camera few times so I am still getting the hang of it. Worked great outdoors at an Easter Egg hunt with lots of moving kids. Took pictures inside with lousy lighting and any movement did blur the people a majority of the time. Has plenty of scene adjustments for those not interested in too much control. Telephoto is wonderful so it makes up for a few other drawbacks. Would still recommend the camera just be careful of what you intend to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Hounddog87

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but I gotta say READ THE MANUAL Which comes on CD There are many features which will only make full sense when you read the manual, or just skim through the important parts. It will take some practice before everything comes out just the way you want it. The super zoom is amazing and the wide angle is better than most DSLR wide angle lenses, it really is very impressive. The backlit sensor really does wonders in low light and I have only used the flash but a handful of times. The camera also has a built in HDR mode which does surreal pictures in low light VERY COOL
customer_reviews.author: Rberriz

customer_reviews.title: this is a great camera, however the one I bought was used ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great camera,however the one I bought was used and supposed to be fine. there are problems with the shutter which prevents it from snapping the picture on time. si have to press the button three or times on occasions before it will work. so I say ,don't buy a used one otherwise a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Belonos

customer_reviews.title: Not an Indoor Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor pictures OK pictures indoors Horrible pics if you want to take pictures of kids or anything else that moves. I am not sure why the "Sports" mode is even there. I havent been able to tak eone good picture with the sports mode. Indoor pics usually turn out grainy and kind of blurred. If you force the flash, the pics are totally washed out. Overall I am disappointed and not happy with Nikon's response of "hold the button half way down and than press" as if I didnt know that. I will get rid of it and buy a Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Chinmoy Goswami

customer_reviews.title: not a bad camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in March of 2012. I love the zoom options. Never had a problem with the camera yet. It is very easy to use. It is great at taking photos outside with natural lighting, but not so much inside without a flash. I like the fact that you can zoom in while video recording, something my previous camera could not do. I take this camera everywhere with me and love taking photos when I can.
customer_reviews.author: S. Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Is particularly good in low light situations. Traveled around France taking pictures of inside cathedrals and churches. The detail was far and away better than you could see with the naked eye...all without flash or tripod. A tad bit on the heavy side compared with compacts you can slip into your pocket...but the features very well makeup for it. So many features I probably will never use.
customer_reviews.author: mobudico

customer_reviews.title: CoolPix S9100
customer_reviews.text: Very much like the CoolPix S8000, the S9100 should perform even better with the additional features. First testing has proven quite comparable to the older S8000. Though familiar with the general software of the camera, I expect it to be an improvement, but have yet to use the camera extensively. At current prices, this camera is a great buy and should serve you well. The 18 times wide angle will give you improved versatility. I wish Amazon offered a Nikon brand soft leather case with belt attachment for this camera like they have for the older S8000 series. The Nikon brand case Amazon has offered for the S9100 is, unfortunately, a hard leather and has no belt attachment capability.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Newman

customer_reviews.title: ~7 months later
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked as expected when received. However, at ~7 months, the lens would not extent all the way when turned on. This made it so you could do nothing but pull the battery to retract the lens. When sent in to Nikon, they said not under warranty and ~$120.0 to fix. They didn't say what was wrong or why not covered either. Not really happy with a product that is less than a year old isn't covered by the warranty and the fix is ~70% of the cost new.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received wouldn't focus, took terrible pictures. I returned it and got another. The second had a different problem, every time I turned it on in the auto mode it displayed an error message and I had to turn the dial to another mode and then back to use the auto mode. It did seem to be taking better pictures, although not focusing in every situation. 2 bad ones was enough for me, I'm returning it and getting an olympus sz30.
customer_reviews.author: D M Ost

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great, especially HD movies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera after much research. I was well aware of the negatives that people have repeated in their reviews, but took the leap anyway. So far it is a great camera. I was mainly interested in the HD movie feature and that has been superb. Crisp, clear, good sound. I mainly use a DSL for stills, but this produces excellent photos for a point and shoot. Zoom is a wow, too. For the price and with the outstanding HD movie mode, get it.
customer_reviews.author: GFP

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell you, that I am so glad that I finally made the decision to purchase a digital camera. This particular product has so many different functions and features (I admit that I'm still experimenting.) I don't pretend to be a pro of any kind when it comes to digital photography, but am glad that Nikon has great software included to help with learning how to capture great pictures. I highly recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: H. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera does a credible job with a few exceptions. Autofocus for one is sub par and would definitely make for a better camera if it would only focus on what is said it is focussed on. Second, the menu structure is just abysmal. For a pocket camera there should be a much better integration of features; instead I find the options all over the map. The Auto mode works for less than half of all normal situations I encounter. In short, not terrible but not wonderful either...just okay.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's not too much bigger than other amateur cameras, and the image quality is far superior. You get surprisingly focused pictures at the 18x optical zoom, and you also have a more clearly defined field of focus (if you focus on a person, the background will be out of focus in a good way).
customer_reviews.author: Chase Russell

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100 from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera about a month and have not used it extensively yet; however, the optical zoom was great for family pictures at our Thanksgiving gathering. There was a problem with glare on the viewfinder in full sun, but the lighter weight and "pocketability" meet my needs for a good camera to use in the field. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera a year and a half ago and after reading the reviews I guess we were lucky. Our camera did not start freezing up until just a month ago!! Thankfully, someone who reviewed this item explained how to remedy this problem, but when you spend this much on a camera you should not have to fiddle with the lense to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Since I dropped my camera in the sand, I had considered buying a whole new system, but I liked my Coolpix and I knew how to use the features on it. When this camera was listed as 'Good' I thought, 'OK my camera was in good condition, I can handle a few scratches.' So I was surprised to find it in 'Almost New' condition. It works better than my old one did before I dropped it in the sand. And I was happy to buy the camera only, and not all the batteries and cords, etc. since I already had those. Yes. I am a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Ann R Pole

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my camera! Out of the box, the snap shot I took of my kids were all a blurr, unless the sat perfectly still. But when I put the owners manuel dvdrom in and did a little reading, I found out how to put the top dial on "scene" and then push the menu button, then select "sport" for outdoors or "party/indoor" for indoors. Now I absolutely LOVE this camera. The HD video is so rich and amazing!!! Plus you can zoom, while recording video, which is also amazing!! The price is definately unbeattable too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: S9100 review
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had this camera very long but so far it meets all our expectations. It is compact enough to not be a burden but big enough to carry and take pix easily. The Auto feature & face recognition is a favorite and my wife likes the good image stabilization. We plan to take it on vacation soon and intend to use it extensively.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrunner

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Camera 9100
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 9100. I gave my first one to my wife because of the quality of pictures and ease of use. As for Amazon it is by far the best to order items on line. My only complaint is that some of the companies linked to Amazon charge a fairly high handling charge for very small items. Amazon the main company is outstanding. Carl
customer_reviews.author: C. Knisley

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, BUT it wont last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a little less than a year ago. I must say I loved the pictures, zoom and overall quality. The problem? It just went black on me one day, simply DIED. Funny enough I had seen some reviews with the same warning, but decided to roll the dice anyway since it had great features. So, all in all a great camera, if you want one that will only last 10 months...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the work , I do , taking Real Estate pictures, I wanted it for a back up camera, I used all day , the 1st day , I am very Happy !.
customer_reviews.author: Landlady

customer_reviews.title: nikon coolpicx s9100
customer_reviews.text: I am setting up a store front on Etsy.com under TreasuringthePast and am allowed 5 pictures per item. The pictures I use on this site can make or break me, which is why I choose to upgrade my camera to the 9100. There's alot to learn, but still easy to use right out of the box. The images are sharp and close-ups are easier than ever before. The only thing I recommend is to get a tripod to help keep your shots consistent and clear.
customer_reviews.author: jewelee2000

customer_reviews.title: Focus problems
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pocketable point n shoot of decent quality.The photos were not reasonably sharp.I have reasonable expectations for this type of camera but it didn't come close.A variety of shots in static settings-not good.Liked the zoom range+handling but no go.Returned to Amazon-customer service excellent.
customer_reviews.author: offtheback

customer_reviews.title: A good replacement overall
customer_reviews.text: We like the size and facility of the Coolpix. However, we found on vacation that using it in sunlight is a problem since it does not have a viewfinder. This made our pics a guessing game, and we didn't take more than two on that entire day of the vacation. We are a little disappointed by that.
customer_reviews.author: MSUMindy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, this camera is amazing. It takes amazing pictures at no zoom and at 18x zoom. The only gripe I have would be the lack of information in the instruction book on uses and features because this camera is loaded... granted the book would be the size of a dictionary if they covered everything. Otherwise this camera is amazing, panoramic pictures are easy, live motion both video and still images are outstanding. The best way to learn is to just play with it.
customer_reviews.author: nksteiny

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX S9100 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 18x NIKKOR ED...
customer_reviews.text: Nikon COOLPIX S9100 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 18x NIKKOR ED... It's a very good camera, I love it. However, lens makes noise when you start zooming, especially at night. Nikon customer service is very nice. I sent for a repair ( paid for shipping myself) , they cleaned my camera, fixed the problem. Sent it back, but it still makes noise when zooming. Other than that, I love this camera !
customer_reviews.author: Jiraphan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with 9100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 9100 in December of 2011 and in January took it on a 2 week vacation to Norway. I was very disappointed with the picture quality in general, and about 1 week into the trip, I developed a dust particle on the sensor. Nikon says this is nearly impossible but I have the ruined images to prove it. I debated long and hard between the Nikon and the update to my trusty Canon SX200 IS (SX230 IS). I followed all of the glowing reviews for the 9100 so that is what I opted for. My mistake. Should have gone with my gut and stayed with the Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Frogkarma

customer_reviews.title: Wrong camera/
customer_reviews.text: This what not the product that I ordered . This is a whole different brand . Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: AGT

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: For day lighting this camera is fine. If you are wanting to take any pictures with even slightly dim lighting, this camera is terrible!!! Taking pictures in door is a joke and they turn out terrible. The zoom works well, but lighting is such a big issue that I can not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: lorp

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my purse I don't go anywhere without a camera. I am very impressed with the quality of photos, speed from one photo to next, and the 18x zoom is great. The only item missing was a regular charger so that I can charge one battery while still using the camera. I was able to pick up 2nd battery and charger at a very good price with Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned as camera did not shoot really top quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I liked it so much that I ordered another as a backup. Also takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pictures is really amazing. Another thing - it is extremely light; making traveling with it a pleasure. The zoom is excellent and the amount of features is impressive. I bought this camera to replace a Canon Selphy and there is no comparison, really.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Camera
customer_reviews.text: My Sony camera, though it took very good pictures, was extremely battery hungry. I checked Consumer Reports for recommendations of cameras and found this Nikon to be highly recommended for my purposes, so I purchased it from Amazon. So far I'm quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: loustorm

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. Great Transaction. Great camera. This one a replacement for one which was broken, too old to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M Walker

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing a new camera for myself, and this one had great reviews and a good price. I'm not interested in owning a DSLR even though they're the trendy camera right now; I don't need to take "professional quality" photos. This one does everything an average person needs it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: My first Nikon. Outdoor pictures of Granddaughter ,dogs,trees,grass ,flowers,sky is absolutely incredible.Very nice handling and ease of use.Be careful taking indoor pictures not to shake camera as you depress the shutter button.Just the slightest movememnt makes blurry pictures .If you remain steady it does take excellent photos indoors.The video is very good.I only shoot short clips ,maybe 1-2 minutes ,but I take lots of short video clips ,very nice results.The camera is a very solid camera and I am not sorry I bought it .I would recommend it to any one .
customer_reviews.author: R. Perry Jr.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE that ZOOM!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best camera for the 100-200 price range! I've tried tons of digital cameras and the zoom on the S9100 was the selling feature for me! This is the second one I've purchased after years of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: PFManning

customer_reviews.title: nikon s9100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the s9100 about a month ago and so far I am pleased with it. When I first used it I took a lot of pictures that were blurred but I was moving the camera too much. I love the pictures it takes in low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera and like almost all Amazon deals costs less than the big box stores and is not to be in their limited stock. This camera does all pictures well and does great videos too.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Engel

customer_reviews.title: Alot of camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: The best pictures and easy to use,ive had a sony DSC-S75 for 6 years now and it served me will but the quality of the pictures i get with the nikon S9100 is so much better.Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Don L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for fun..
customer_reviews.text: Best point and shoot I've ever used. Comes really close to DSLR quality. I love the selective color feature that it has.
customer_reviews.author: A. P

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera as a gift. It has never taken good pictures. If you make enough adjustments, you can get a decent picture out of it, but most are either blurred or yellow tinted.
customer_reviews.author: D Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 10 months...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera however after 10 months of use I now have the dreaded zoom lock up. I have sent it to Nikon for warranty repair and I will post a follow up once I see what Nikon does......
customer_reviews.author: CaptRick

customer_reviews.title: I would have to agree that it takes blurry pictures
customer_reviews.text: I read some good reviews from magazines and other websites, but I didn't check the Amazon reviews. I was also in a hurry to buy it, which was a mistake. I agree with the 1-2 star reviews. It does handle lighting and exposure well. It is also very fast, does back lighting very well. but none of this matters if it is out of focus. So I am returning it today. I buy most everything from Amazon now because of their no hassle return policy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Altogether very happy with this camera and with seller
customer_reviews.text: Altogether very happy with this camera and with seller .Although the language was German the seller translated some text for me (or was that Amazon).A very happy experience .Thank you .John K
customer_reviews.author: john k

customer_reviews.title: Large spot on lens or sensor
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely unhappy with a recent purchase of a camera for my wife for a Valentine's gift. Purchased in January, a Nikon, Coolpix sS9100, 12.1 Miga-pixels. Upon opening, and taking her first photo, we noticed a large blemish / spot in/on the lens, which may be from a lens sensor or something else. Unfortunately, she opened the package/gift a few days past the 30 day exchange/returnable date.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, very easy to use, top quality images and great lens. Can take great pictures and overall very intuitive to use. I bought it exclusively for our trip to Europe and it has turned out to be the best camera we have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Camera was suppose to be open box like new, has big scratches on viewing screen
customer_reviews.text: Camera was suppose to be open box like new, has big scratches on viewing screen, obviously used, other wise nice camera, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Refurbished Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera came promptly and with all the books and chargers. Looking at it and using it, you cannot tell it has been refurbished, and I have had no problems with it since it has arrived!
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Little more complicated than I anticipated.  Also somewhat awkward to hold, esp with the pop up flash (when needed)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one of my grand daughters, who is 14 yrs of age. was disappointed that a regular paper book did not come with it. Received a "book" in form of a CD. Other than that, and comments above, it takes great pictures. Hoping she will learn all the "in's & outs" of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: David Lavender

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best small camera I've ever purchased. Zoom is awesome, easy to use, great size for pocket, amazing picture quaility. I would recommend for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kan

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures/HD Video
customer_reviews.text: This camera for the price is awesome! The pictures turned out really good and the HD video is perfect for what I need it for! I wish they had a feature that would wirelessly share your pictures to a computer or a one touch button to share but that's okay I can just plug it in, no biggie. Took pictures in low lighting and it almost looked as if I took it while it was some-what still sunny out (took some pictures at sunset). One of my best cameras i've had, ever. Perfect price!
customer_reviews.author: djtimwalters

customer_reviews.title: Nikon is going cheap
customer_reviews.text: I am upgrading from an S6100. I was surprised with the changes made by Nikon. No written manual. The pdf is over 236 pages and try taking that out to the field with you. (can print it but the time/cost!). No case that came with the 6100. No SM CARD does have internal memory to get you going. I hoped that it would have a Raw option (not in the specs). To get used to the controls am reading the pdf file but would have preferred a written manual.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Morris

customer_reviews.title: easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand why I cant just give the item a star rating and eave it at that. sometimes you dont have anything more to add than the other users have already typed.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nikon 9100
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. The zoom is great at 18x for the small digital you want to carry in your pocket. My favorite featre is the color select. You take a black & white pictue and "highligh" the color you want to POP! This camera was about $100.0 less through Amazon than it is in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Super zoom....
customer_reviews.text: We took this camera to Glacier National Park this fall and were able to get wonderful photos very easily. We did buy a hard cover for it because we were worried about the hiking taking a toll on the camera. This also protected the screen. Love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: jame r meys

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do all we wish it to. But, I really resent having to supply words that are unnecessary. In the future, I'll just ignore these feedback emails.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: BLURRY PICTURES
customer_reviews.text: Blurry pictures about half of the time. Not a good point & shoot camera in auto mode. My Canon SD 780 IS under the same conditions takes perfect pictures. Would not recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: ImEven2

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: We've tried all kinds of settings. I would say that 30% of the pictures are blurry/not clear. Very disappointed. Terrible. Update: SEnt to Nikon (got free exteded warranty) they "fixed" it, still is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Future photographer
customer_reviews.text: My son is 12 now and he has been using this camera for a few years and loves it. He takes pics of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Elton P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera. We are so pleased with it. I particularly love the image control that keeps my pictures steady even though I shake. The pictures are fabulous and don't even require any correction. It's so easy to use and fits in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: quadssss

customer_reviews.title: Takes really good monochromes and food pics
customer_reviews.text: Takes really good monochromes and food pics. P.S. I am not a pro, I just wanted something to take pictures with, other than my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Plex

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. It is just the right size to fit in my purse and it takes great pictures as well.
customer_reviews.author: KBF

customer_reviews.title: Takes blurry pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes blurry pictures. I liked the zoom and display but when it can't take picture that is the main task for a camera then other features are useless. I returned the camera and will buy a SONY NEX instead. I hope that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This Camera takes very good pics. Couldn't of made a better deal for that price. Very compact. The zoom is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I appears that I did not receive a new camera ...
customer_reviews.text: I appears that I did not receive a new camera. I has the same problem as the same camera I wanted to replace it with. I will not shut off without adjusting the telescope. I want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Familiar with camera so when I lost mine I wanted another. This seller was excellent. Very quick shipment. Eveything as advertised Superb camera, I did research and also found great reports.
customer_reviews.author: AEntertain

customer_reviews.title: Good travel zoom
customer_reviews.text: I am DSLR shooter and this is my pocket camera. I was amazed with zoom on this camera it is mind blowing. Sensor is good and is is super easy yo use. I would want more manual control but modes Nikon have on this camera are clever I must say. Auto focus is fast and accurate and I like video
customer_reviews.author: Davorin Duranovic

customer_reviews.title: Not Dependable
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes beautiful long-distance pictures. But it's not versatile or dependable enough to capture candid shots, many of which were blurry, especially if there is any movement. If I had realized within 30 days of purchase, I would have returned it. It will go to our local thrift shop.
customer_reviews.author: P. Haddad

customer_reviews.title: great camera.
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning about all of the functions on the camera. I think is a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stellmacher

customer_reviews.title: Can't focus in low light
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this camera specifically because of improved low light abilities over Panasonic ZS7. I was surprised that after an afternoon and evening of shooting, there was a very poor ability to focus consistently. Had a friend's Canon SX230, and it was able to photograph the scene. I have returned it as there are certainly other choices that can take low light photos.
customer_reviews.author: nocalalan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: We've had this camera less than a year. After about six months it stopped working and we had to send it in for repairs (covered by the warranty). Now, six months later, it's not working again.
customer_reviews.author: PHT

customer_reviews.title: Awful in every way
customer_reviews.text: Bad interface, slow, cannot focus unless perfect lighting. No does not work after little use. Go with canon for point and shoot. Unless you are buying professional series equipment - avoid Nikon all together.
customer_reviews.author: Clemtigers

customer_reviews.title: great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that a thousand other satisfied people have said about a cool camera that always works. Great
customer_reviews.author: aadavidallen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price...I highly recommend it so far I'm happy with the camera. Easy to use and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: An amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: When compared to other compact digital cameras. Nikon Coolpix S9100 is head and shoulders above the rest. It is comparable to professional and SLR cameras. Has amazing features, excellent lens, a good software with a long battery life. All in all, this is a great deal for a less than 200 dollars camera.
customer_reviews.author: mghanim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I received my camera a few days after i ordered it. It was in like-new condition. The flash sticks a bit, but that's my only concern.
customer_reviews.author: AmeliaLeona

customer_reviews.title: Geat camera
customer_reviews.text: Crispy pictures and high quality videos, good pictures even in the dark. Many features to discovory and to play around. Zoom could get blury easily, other than that, I like this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Yuancheng Liu

customer_reviews.title: nikon cool pix camera
customer_reviews.text: i love the 18x zoom. When battery goes....it's quick nothing to replace it with. settings when taking pictures in a banquet room with lighting on walls sometimes tough to find the right setting. overall like it.
customer_reviews.author: northern thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S9100 18x
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really great, the only thing is the batteries last only 5 months had to buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pokahntis

customer_reviews.title: damaged charging port
customer_reviews.text: It is not good. the charging socket has been damaged and I couldn't use the recharging from the camera. I should use external charger
customer_reviews.author: ma

customer_reviews.title: elaine
customer_reviews.text: would like a hard copy of the manual- it is only available if I download 200+ pages. The camera is great - but I dont know how to work everything.
customer_reviews.author: cold and sinus

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the camera, so was my granddaughter which is why I just ordered a second one. The price was right...though I paid more for the second camera than the first. For the price, great camera so far. I have a lot of learning to do on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Better than a whole old fashioned darkroom I once had.
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful. I need more time to learn how to move from my old film and chemicals process- and love doing it
customer_reviews.author: bobsound

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX S9100 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 18x NIKKOR ED Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


GRAB YOUR PASSPORT, GRAB YOUR CAMERA AND GO!
ADVANCED, POWERFUL, YET CAN GO ANYWHERE
921,000-dot, ultra-high resolution display The new Nikon COOLPIX S9100 is loaded with innovative Nikon technology, like a 12.1-megapixel CMOS sensor that assures superb image quality in low-light conditions. Optimized with Nikon's exclusive EXPEED C2 processing engine, you'll capture natural looking pictures with exceptional detail. You'll also love composing images on the large three-inch Clear Color Display. This dazzling 921,000-dot, ultra-high resolution display, makes viewing photos and HD movies instantly gratifying.

Whether you're people watching in Paris or waiting for just the right light to hit the Grand Canal in Venice, the COOLPIX S9100's High-Speed Shooting feature captures five photos in approximately one second at full resolution. And Subject Tracking keeps the camera automatically focused on your moving subject.

At 1.4 inches thin and 7.6 ounces in weight, the portable COOLPIX S9100 is the perfect travel companion, no matter where in the world you take it.

WIDE-ANGLE, HIGH POWER, COMPACT ZOOM-NIKKOR® LENS
Producing precision camera optics is at the heart of Nikon's proud photographic heritage. The COOLPIX S9100 is no exception. Its high quality 18x wide-angle optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens offers impressive telephoto coverage (25-450mm) with outstanding color capture and razor-sharp results. This is the only lens you'll ever need for exacting portrait studies, scenic panoramas, and challenging compositions. Plus, we realize that shooting from the roof of an SUV, a gondola overlooking the Swiss Alps, or a whale-watching boat in Iceland can get bumpy . That's why we've included a five-way, Hybrid Electronic VR Image Stabilization system with the COOLPIX S9100. It uses sensor shift in combination with electronic stabilization features to minimize the effects of camera shake, so you can say goodbye to unwanted streaky or blurred images. 

CREATE A SCENE AND GET THE MOST OUT OF EVERY SHOT.
Night Landscape mode The world is brimming with creative shooting opportunities, and the COOLPIX S9100 has the advanced features to match. Choose one of 19 Scene Modes to assure optimized camera settings for specific scenes. Or, with Scene Auto Selector, the camera automatically selects the most appropriate mode from among seven choices for you. Plus, Nikon's amazing Easy Panorama mode allows you to pan the camera in any direction as it automatically detects, combines and assembles your shots into one seamless panoramic image. 

With Night Landscape mode, the COOLPIX S9100 captures high quality images at night. It shoots a series of consecutive shots and composes them into a single, brilliant image. Night Portrait mode takes outdoor portraits against bright backgrounds and combines multiple shots to capture the essence of night scenes. And, the COOLPIX S9100's Backlighting HDR Mode automatically provides optimum exposures when you're shooting backlit subjects. 

BRING BACK FULL HD (1080P) MOVIES OF YOUR TREKS AROUND THE WORLD.
Sharing your travel adventures—or posting them on the Internet for friends and relatives—is even more exciting with Full HD (1080p) movies. While the COOLPIX S9100 can capture hundreds of memorable still images for you to easily print and save, its moviemaking features bring a safari, ski trip, cruise, or balloon ride to life. The One-Touch movie recording button shoots 1090p HD Movies—complete with stereo sound. Plus, optical zoom and auto focus functions will bring you close to the action. You can even shoot still images while recording movies, or experiment with special effects like fast or slow motion. When the time comes to share your movies, simply use the in-camera playback feature or the convenient HDMI-CEC output for quick hookup to an HDTV or computer. 

IN-CAMERA SPECIAL EFFECTS THAT DON'T REQUIRE POST-SHOT PROCESSING.
You don't want to be hassled with post-shot processing, which is why Nikon equipped the COOLPIX S9100 with in-camera special effects. These advanced features help you take shots you've never considered before! You can re-capture yesteryear with the Nostalgic Sepia effect, or try some intricate black and white shooting with the High-Contrast Monochrome feature. This versatile camera also lets you highlight bright areas of a photo with the High Key effect, or highlight dark areas with the Low Key mode. A Selective Color feature boosts the vibrancy of specific aspects of a photo or movie, while Soft Effect subdues harsh elements for a gentler, silkier look. The COOLPIX S9100 even has a Creative Slider to adjust the brightness, intensity and hue of an image. 

CONVENIENT FEATURES
When traveling on an exotic adventure, you can't afford missed photo opportunities. You'll find Nikon's Motion Detection feature to be important because it identifies moving objects and automatically adjusts shutter speed and ISO to assure crisp, blur free images. When conditions conspire against you, Nikon's Best Shot Selector automatically takes up to 10 shots and saves the sharpest image. ISO speeds up to 3200 will help you capture great shots in low-light. Blinking eyes and red-eye can ruin portraits . That's why the COOLPIX S9100 includes Blink Warning. It also offers in-camera Red-Eye Fix™ that automatically corrects red-eye as you shoot and Skin Softening that smoothes skin tones. The COOLPIX S9100 also has Macro Shooting for shooting as close as 1.6 inches. And, when you're in remote regions, you'll appreciate the camera's 270-shot rechargeable Li-ion battery.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * COOLPIX S9100 Digital Camera
 * AN-CP19 Strap
 * UC-E6 USB Cable
 * EG-CP16 Audio/Video Cable
 * EN-EL12 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * EH-69P AC Adapter/Charger
 * Nikon View NX 2 CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 18x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED Glass Lens.
12.1-megapixel CMOS sensor for high-speed operation and exceptional low-light performance.
3-inch Ultra-High Resolution VGA (921,000-dot) Clear Color Display
Capture 5 shots per second at full resolution

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
